thread.title_full: Caption this photo: Archer edition (3 photos)

author: Archer
title: Caption this photo: Archer edition (3 photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Our Chivers know that Archer has been providing us with some of the best comedic lines on television for 7 strong seasons – lines that make you laugh so hard you pull a muscle. Lines that spit out your drink. Lines that you’ve bonded with friends over or picked up a date with. Lines like: “Danger Zone,”“Um, phrasing,”“You killed a black astronaut, Cyril! That’s like killing a unicorn!” These have become cultural touchstones for our generation, and elevated the comedic timing of humans around the globe. 
As we anxiously await for Archer’s 8th season, Archer: Dreamland , we want to see your phrasing – put yourself in Sterling Archer’s shoes and caption this photo ! 
Winner and runner-up gets the sweet Chivery prize packages shown below. Must fill in proper email when commenting. All comments will be considered and winners will be chosen at the editors’ discretion. Deadline is Midnight on March 27th. 
Archer: Dreamland will take place entirely inside of Sterling Archer’s comatose mind – a mind that happens to live in 1947 Hollywood. The now retired Archer takes on a new role as a hard-boiled private investigator in a noir world full of private eyes, plainclothes cops and femme fatales. 
Archer: Dreamland premieres Wednesday, April 5th at 10PM on FXX, and don’t forget to download the Archer, P.I. augmented reality app that lets you solve cases with Archer as you watch the new season of Archer: Dreamland . Available in all app stores now . While the real fun begins April 5th with the Season Premiere, you can use the Archer, P.I. augmented reality app to find clues hidden in numerous real world objects like the Season 8 poster, in the promo below (hint: over the title card), Archer apparel , and the Art of Archer book . 2
